title: Silicone Red Spatula and Spoonula Set of 2
description: Have fun "mixing it up" in the kitchen with this Cake Boss Novelty Tools and Gadgets 2-Piece Silicone Spatula and Spoonula Set. Cake Boss Novelty Tools and Gadgets make baking fun and easier for bakers of all ages, and this spatula and Spoonula set is designed with the sturdy traditional beechwood handles loved by professional bakers for its resistance to heat, color and flavor absorption. Both silicone heads have screen-printed phrases: The spatula reads "Mix It Up" and the Spoonula has "My Kitchen, My Rules." They’re ideal for folding batters and meringues, for scraping melted chocolate out of pans, and for stirring sweet sauces. The Spoonula and spatula are both heat safe to 450°F and hang for convenient storage. Cake Boss Novelty Tools and Gadgets, like this fun Spoonula and spatula set, work well with many other great items from the Cake Boss collections. Mix up batters, sauces and fun in the kitchen with the Cake Boss Novelty Tools and Gadgets 2-Piece Silicone Spatula and Spoonula Set.Set includes an 11.5 in. spatula with "Mix It Up" and a 13 in. spoonula with "My Kitchen, My RuleNovelty tools feature solid, flexible silicone heads that are sturdy enough for thick doughDesigned with traditional beechwood handles loved by professional bakers and each features a silicone headEach novelty tool hangs for convenient storage
